code.snippet:
from langgraph.graph import StateGraph
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI

# Define agent state
class AgentState(TypedDict):
    messages: list
    next_action: str

# Create workflow
workflow = StateGraph(AgentState)

# Add nodes
workflow.add_node("planner", planning_node)
workflow.add_node("executor", execution_node)
workflow.add_node("validator", validation_node)

# Add edges
workflow.add_edge("planner", "executor")
workflow.add_conditional_edges(
    "executor",
    should_continue,
    {"continue": "validator", "end": END}
)

app = workflow.compile()

from crewai import Agent, Task, Crew

# Define agents
researcher = Agent(
    role="Researcher",
    goal="Find latest AI trends",
    backstory="Expert in AI research",
    tools=[search_tool, scraper_tool]
)

writer = Agent(
    role="Writer",
    goal="Write engaging content",
    backstory="Tech writer specialist",
    tools=[writing_tool]
)

# Define tasks
research_task = Task(
    description="Research AI agents 2025",
    agent=researcher
)

write_task = Task(
    description="Write article from research",
    agent=writer
)

# Create crew
crew = Crew(
    agents=[researcher, writer],
    tasks=[research_task, write_task],
    verbose=True
)

result = crew.kickoff()

code.snippet:
from langchain.agents import create_react_agent
from langchain.tools import Tool
from langchain_openai import ChatOpenAI

# Define retrieval tool
retrieval_tool = Tool(
    name="knowledge_base",
    func=vector_store.similarity_search,
    description="Search company knowledge base"
)

# Define web search tool
web_tool = Tool(
    name="web_search",
    func=search_api.search,
    description="Search the web for current info"
)

# Create ReAct agent
agent = create_react_agent(
    llm=ChatOpenAI(model="gpt-4"),
    tools=[retrieval_tool, web_tool],
    prompt=react_prompt
)

# Agent decides autonomously which tool to use
result = agent.invoke({
    "input": "What are our Q4 2025 sales projections?"
})
